name: Sophica - Temples Of Mystery Demo
detailed_description:
Sophica: Temples Of Mystery, is a First Person, Puzzle Platformer.
You wake up in your bed, look outside to see that you are among the clouds.
《Is this a dream?》 You continue forward to see what this is about, the mystery lies ahead...

Easy to play, but hard to master.
Can you make it trough all the levels?

- - - - - - - - - -

We have a Kickstarter! Please concidering supporting us before the release!

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/auguststeiro/sophica-temples-of-mystery

- - - - - - - - - -

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 770 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Game settings can be changed in ingame menu for possible play on low end systems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5 2.8 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 equivalent DX11 GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 770 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Game settings can be changed in ingame menu for possible play on low end systems
